overview: Recognized go to person as a Sales Leader and development of Sales teams from Start Ups to F 500 companies. Most recently the Vice President of Sales for Sling Media responsible for creating the Sales and Channel Marketing strategies to launch the Slingbox in North America and the UK…achieving 100,000 plus in the first year of sales and over 500,000 units within the first 2 1/2 years creating, once again a new category for Retail and Online Consumer Electronics consumer solutions. Gregg has created award winning strategies for the development and execution of launch activities of new technologies in the top National CE Retail and Online resellers in North America, UK and other territories.
